name: Epic Spirit·Gerold's Glory
description: Charge Master Rifle, the weapon of Jolo Lore. Only the people valued by Jolo Lore can receive the gift from God. This is the only way to honor the great war-field weapon owned by Jolo Lore for many years.

name: Epic Spirit·Ghul's Rage
description: War - Scar Gore, as Odin's maid for serving alcohol, is as wild as Odin. She wants war and Gore's fury is the best proof. This is the holy soldier who only obeys the orders from the most powerful warrior.

name: Epic Spirit·Herist's Bow
description: The bow in the name of God is the most commonly used weapon of Agitated God, Hrist. It can shoot powerful arrows, which can even pierce the strong wall of Lantie. Used by Hrist to bestow the heroes with contributions.

name: Epic Spirit·Landy's Shield
description: The shield of Landy Grace. Although known as a shield destroyer, Landy's shield is the one she can never destroy, and only the merciful one deserves this shield.

name: Epic Spirit·Regie's Rage
description: Knives was made by the rage of the God of the Holiness, Reginleif. It is the glory of the holiness. Only a very strong man can control this sharp sword full of God's anger.

name: Epic Spirit·Sklar's Will
description: Skullgrid axe, the will incarnation of Skullgrid. Only those who have made great contributions to Valhalla can acquire this axe, and those who defy the will be sentenced to death!

name: Equestrian's Spear
description: A long gun which brings out its full power when used on a horse's back.

name: Equestrian's Spear [2]
description: A long gun which brings out its full power when used on a horse's back.

name: Equip Chest
description: The equipment of every profession is here.

name: Equip Supply box
description: A small delicate box, what materials it contains is unknown.

name: Eraser [2]
description: A powerful wand that can weaken the spiritual force of the enemy.

name: Eraser [3]
description: A powerful wand that can weaken the spiritual force of the enemy.

name: Erde Mace [2]
description: It is made in the form of a snake that symbolizes the source of knowledge.

name: Erde Mace [3]
description: It is made in the form of a snake that symbolizes the source of knowledge.

name: Eternal Love
description: Shining and gorgeous, the promise of love flows through time and never dies.

name: Eternal Rock
description: The legendary stone that contains a powerful force. It's said that once you find the one that knows well about the stone, you can initialize your own qualities. You can visit Raynojose in Prontera Adventurers League HQ to use this item.

name: Eternal Spear Shard
description: Shard of the legendary artifact: Eternal Spear. By collecting rare materials and more debris, with ancient knowledge and legendary Mr. Dragon's skills, you may restore it to the original form.
